entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is speaking and interacting with others in the Hog's Head pub.

entities.name: zacharias smith
entities.description: A member of Dumbledore's Army, who is questioning Harry about Cedric Diggory's death.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as having told the group about Cedric Diggory's death last year.

entities.name: cedric diggory
entities.description: A student who was killed by Voldemort, mentioned as being brought back to Hogwarts by Harry.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, who is responsible for Cedric Diggory's death and is mentioned as a murderer.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school where Harry and others are students, mentioned as being the place where Cedric Diggory's body was brought back to.

relationships.description: Harry is arguing with Zacharias Smith about Cedric Diggory's death.
Dumbledore is associated with Hogwarts, where he is the headmaster.
